title: I Am Funny Like That: A Funny Look At Life
description: Now on Amazonâ€™s Top 10 Best Sellers list, Helen C. Escott's hysterical blog "I am Funny Like That" has come to life in this witty book! If you have thrown your back out taking off Spanx, planned your husband's murder in your head or screamed through a Brazilian, this book is for you. If you need a good laugh, or need to smile, this book is better than Prozac it will make you laugh out loud for days after reading it. 119,000 blog readers can't be wrong!
author: Helen C. Escott
